TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控制項集合，用於追蹤和管理相關控制項群組。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是唯讀的集合，通常所使用的控制項並控制項，以管理多組控制項。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by and controls to manage sets of controls. A控制項會使用物件來保存一份所有控制頁面上，而控制項會使用物件來追蹤它所包含的控制項。A control uses a object to keep a list of all the controls on a page, whereas a control uses a object to track the controls that it contains. > [!NOTE] > 集合會同時包含控制項和放在其他伺服器控制項 （例如使用者控制項、 自訂控制項，與 ASP.NET 控制項）區域和 Web 組件的應用程式的一部分。The collection contains both controls and other server controls (such as user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls) that are placed in zones and used as part of Web Parts applications. 因此，例如，如果您有區域在頁面中，並在其中您宣告自訂控制項和 ASP.NET控制項，在中，將會是兩個控制項所參考的集合屬性。So, for example, if you have a zone in a page, and within it you declare a custom control and the ASP.NET control, both controls will be in the collection referenced by the property. 物件存在，讓 Web 組件控制集可以使用強類型集合。The object exists so that the Web Parts control set can work with strongly typed collections. 同樣地，如果您想要執行大量作業的一組控制項，您可以取得參考物件使用屬性。Similarly, if you want to perform mass operations on a set of controls, you can get a reference to a object using the property. 例如，您可能想要循環所有網頁上的控制項並變更其外觀以某種方式。For example, you might want to loop through all the controls on a page and change their appearance in some way. 即使物件是唯讀的您可以透過程式設計方式變更基礎集合中所參考的控制項的屬性。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用Web 組件頁面上的物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the object on a Web Parts page. 此範例中有三個部分：This example has three parts: - 在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含控制項之 Web 網頁。The Web page that contains the controls. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分包含在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 請注意，`Button1_Click`方法會建立物件，包含所有中所參考的控制項屬性，其中包括所有頁面上的控制項。Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a object that consists of all the controls referenced in the property, which includes all the controls on the page. 方法會逐一查看所有控制項，並切換每個控制項屬性，決定該控制項是否為標準或最小化。The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含控制項之 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 請注意，控制項中的宣告`WebPartZone1`是標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，但因為它們會包裝為控制項在執行階段，而類別繼承自類別，控制項就會自動視為控制項在執行階段，因此包含在物件。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls are automatically treated as controls at run time and therefore are included in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器，並按一下 [將頁面載入之後**切換 ChromeState** ] 按鈕，在部分類別中的程式碼中執行迴圈物件或者最小化控制項，或將其還原為正常。After you load the page in a browser and click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, the code in the partial class loops through the object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal. 或者，如果您重複按**切換 BulletedList1 標題**按鈕時，最上方控制項的標題會變更為替代值。Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別新的空執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的空執行個體類別。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 物件本身是唯讀的並沒有方法將個別控制項; 因此，您會有小小的情況下，若要使用這個建構函式。The object itself is read-only and has no method to add individual controls to it; therefore, you will have little occasion to use this constructor.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 傳入 控制項的 集合，初始化 物件的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a object by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的執行個體藉由傳入的集合類別控制項。The constructor initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of controls. 雖然物件處於唯讀狀態且不沒有個別控制項加入的任何方法，建立您自己集合的控制項，並傳遞至建構函式。Although a object is read-only and there is no method for adding individual controls to it, you can create your own collection of controls, and pass that to the constructor. 這可讓您建立自訂的集合，然後執行大量作業，在其上。This enables you to create custom collections and perform bulk operations on them. 您也可以存取集合中的基礎控制項，並以程式設計方式變更其屬性值。You can also access the underlying controls in the collection and change their property values programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用Web 組件頁面上的建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor on a Web Parts page. 此範例中有三個部分：This example has three parts: - 在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含控制項之 Web 網頁。The Web page that contains the controls. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分包含在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 請注意，`Button1_Click`方法會建立物件，包含所有中所參考的控制項屬性，其中包括所有頁面上的控制項。Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a object that consists of all the controls referenced in the property, which includes all the controls on the page. 方法會逐一查看所有控制項，並切換每個控制項屬性，決定該控制項是否為標準或最小化。The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含控制項之 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 請注意，控制項中的宣告`WebPartZone1`是標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，但因為它們會包裝為控制項在執行階段，而類別繼承自類別，控制項就會自動視為控制項在執行階段，因此包含在物件。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls are automatically treated as controls at run time and therefore are included in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**切換 ChromeState**按鈕，並注意的部分類別中的程式碼循環物件或者最小化控制項，或將其還原為正常。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, and notice that the code in the partial class loops through the object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal. 或者，如果您重複按**切換 BulletedList1 標題**按鈕時，最上方控制項的標題會變更為替代值。Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.

span.span: A that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.

summary.span: 傳回數值，表示集合中是否存在特定控制項。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.

returns.span: 布林值，指出集合中是否存在特定控制項。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您檢查特定物件，並判斷它是否屬於物件。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is part of a object.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As WebPart(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 物件的陣列，包含複製的集合。

span.span: An array of objects to contain the copied collection.

param.name: index
param.span: 放置集合內容的陣列起點。

span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 複製集合至 物件的陣列。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，當您想要組合可以包含自訂陣列中的控制項物件，這些控制項的子集或這些控制項的超集。The method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart value) cil managed
Public Function IndexOf (value As WebPart) As Integer

span.span: A that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 傳回集合特定成員的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

returns.span: 整數，表示集合中特定物件的位置。

span.span: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個控制項上的 Web 組件頁面上，而且您需要知道相對於其他控制項的序數位置。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one control relative to the others.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 根據集合的位置或唯一識別項，傳回集合的特定成員。

span.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As WebPart

param.name: index
param.span: 集合中特定 控制項的索引。

span.span: The index of a particular control in a collection.

summary.span: 根據成員在集合中的位置，傳回集合的成員。

span.span: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.

value.span: 位在集合中特定索引處的 。

span.span: A at the specified index in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引子可讓您存取基礎中的控制項物件的索引，並變更其屬性值或呼叫方法。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by index, and change their property values or call methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用Web 組件頁面上的索引子。The following code example demonstrates the use of the indexer on a Web Parts page. 此範例中有三個部分：This example has three parts: - 在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含控制項之 Web 網頁。The Web page that contains the controls. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分包含在部分類別中頁面的程式碼。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 請注意，`Button2_Click`方法會建立空物件，則會指派它控制項從`WebPartZone1.WebParts`屬性。Note that the `Button2_Click` method creates an empty object, then assigns to it the controls from the `WebPartZone1.WebParts` property. 此方法會使用它的索引存取集合中的第一個控制項，並切換其屬性值。The method accesses the first control in the collection by using its index, and toggles its property value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含控制項之 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 請注意，控制項中的宣告`WebPartZone1`是標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，但因為它們會包裝為控制項在執行階段，而類別繼承自類別，控制項可視為控制項在執行的階段和製作的一部分物件。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls can be treated as controls at run time and made part of a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**切換 BulletedList1 標題**按鈕，並注意程式碼切換之間兩個可用的標題選擇控制項的標題。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, and notice that the code toggles the title of the control between the two available title choices.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(id As String) As WebPart

param.name: id
param.span: 集合中特定 控制項的唯一識別碼。

span.span: The unique identifier for a particular control in a collection.

summary.span: 根據唯一字串識別項傳回集合成員。

span.span: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.

value.span: 在集合中，ID 等於 值的第一個 。

span.span: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引子可讓您存取控制中根據唯一識別項的物件。The indexer enables you to access a control in a object according to a unique identifier. > [!NOTE] > Web 組件控制集可讓您執行不區分大小寫比對這個屬性，以便區分大小寫不屬於唯一`id`值。The Web Parts control set performs case-insensitive matching on this property, so case sensitivity is not part of a unique `id` value. 屬性也適用於識別成員在某些特殊情況下的物件。The property also works to identify members of a object in some specialized cases. 若是控制項，這個索引子是能夠符合的識別碼為基礎的子控制項所包裝控制項。In the case of controls, the indexer is able to match the identifier for the underlying child control wrapped by the control. 若是控制項，索引子的比對不區分大小寫的比較為基礎的控制項識別項`id`參數並或屬性值。In the case of controls, the indexer matches the identifier for the control based on a case-insensitive comparison of the `id` parameter and either the or property values.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
